The package is about the central dogma of Molecular Biology. The first function generates a DNA sequence as a character string.The second function does the transcription, in which an RNA copy of a gene's DNA sequence is made.The third function is about the splicing of RNA sequence. The fourth function is about translation, in which proteins are produced using RNA. The fifth function generates a bar plot in which we count the frequency of each amino acid.
